lang.error.maj.information: Connection error with the server. Check the logs for more information.
lang.text.page.about.title: About Okovision 2023
lang.text.page.about.information:
Okovision 2023 is a Fork from an app developped by Stawen Dronek.

Any commercial use is absolutely forbiden without his agreement.

For more information okovision.dronek.com and the Wiki

If you see any bugs, please report them through GitHub, through email, or through the forum

Contact : stommz@gmail.com
lang.text.page.manual.ip.import: To import boiler data directly into Okovision, click on the button corresponding to the desired file
lang.text.page.manual.usb.import: You can import into Okovision the CSV files produced by your boiler
lang.text.page.manual.synthese:
Days List with data but no summary (Warning: the day must be over to make summary possible).
To force the recalculation over a period, click on the calendar icon.
lang.text.page.admin.param.tcref.desc: If you have 2 setpoints, reduced to 19°C and comfort at 21°C, you average -> 20°C. It's for DJU calculation
lang.text.page.admin.param.pellet: Pellet weight for 60 seconds of work :
lang.text.page.admin.param.pellet.desc: Pellet weight in grams measured by operating the furnace feed screw for 60 seconds
lang.text.page.admin.param.ashtray: Pellets burned to fill the ashtray (kg) :
lang.text.page.admin.param.ashtray.desc: For example: 1000kg of pellets -> full ashtray
lang.text.page.season: To have summary graphics, you must define the seasons. A season is a period of one year. You must specify the first day of your season. It can start on September 1, and will end automatically on August 31 of the following year.
lang.text.page.season.title: Season
lang.text.page.matrix:
Your Okofen installation is specific. The CSV file format is unique by boiler. You must "learn" to Okovision to read this file.

  • HK(n): Heating circuit
  • KT: Boiler temperature
  • WW(n): Domestic hot water circuit
  • SK(n): Solar Circuit Domestic hot water
  • PE(n): N°(n) Boiler
  • PU(n): N°(n) Buffer tank
lang.text.page.events: By specifying the various maintenance events (Storage tank filling, Boiler maintenance, ashtray emptying , etc.), Okovision will be able to notify you of upcoming deadlines.
lang.text.page.events.title: Event
lang.text.page.matrix.install: First, import the file by the button below
lang.text.page.matrix.name: Okovision name
lang.text.page.matrix.modal.title: Matrix Modify
lang.text.page.matrix.modal.text:
Are you sure to modify Matrix structure of Boiler CSV file ? ?

This change will not lose data. You will have new columns in the available sensors

If in the new Boiler CSV file that you are going to provide, there are fewer columns, they will be kept so as not to lose data.
lang.text.page.matrix.delete.modal.title: Matrix Delete
lang.text.page.matrix.delete.modal.text:
Are you sure to delete the matrix ?

This will delete all the daily data, but the summaries (history) will be kept

You will have to import a CSV file again to initialize the matrix. Otherwise, nothing will work!
lang.text.page.repport.title: Daily charts names :
lang.text.page.repport.table.name: Name
lang.text.page.repport.asso.title: Assignment Sensors - Charts :
lang.text.page.repport.asso.table.name: Name
lang.text.page.repport.asso.modale.title: Assignment Sensors - Charts
lang.text.page.import.title: Large scale import
lang.text.page.import.action:
All your files must be placed on okovision _tmp directory.
To start import, click on import.
lang.text.page.import.table.title: Files in _tmp / who can be imported
lang.text.page.label.alertStock: Warning: Your stock is less than 10%, Refuel !
lang.text.page.label.alertAshtrayNoInfo: You must specify your ashtray size
lang.text.page.label.alertAshtrayNoDate: You must specify your first ashtray emptying
lang.text.page.label.alertAshtray: Ashtray full. Empty it and update your ashtray management
lang.text.page.rt.modal.title:
Boiler parameters connection
Same to connect to the boiler web interface
lang.text.page.rt.alertWarning: You must save the new configuration
lang.text.page.rt.descSaveConfig: Enter a description, all the information in "Boiler settings" are saved. (150 characters max))
lang.text.page.rt.dateChoised: If you enter a date manually, the configuration will not be applied to the boiler
lang.text.page.rt.deleteConfig: Are you sur to delete this setting ?
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:FA[0].L_mittlere_lauf:
The average time should be between 25 min and 45 min.
A full year of operation must be completed.
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:LOCAL.hk[0].raumtemp_: Indoor temperature setpoint for the comfort range
Indoor temperature setpoint for the reduced range
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:LOCAL.hk[0].heizkurve: The heating curve gives the correspondence between the outside temperature and the flow temperature of the associated heating circuit.
Represents the starting temperature (uncorrected) when it is 15 ° C outside.
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:LOCAL.hk[0].heizgrenz:
During Comfort period
If the average outdoor temperature exceeds this value, the heating circuit is deactivated.

During Reduced period
If the average outdoor temperature exceeds this value, the heating circuit is deactivated.
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:LOCAL.hk[0].vorlaufte: T°C Maximum flow injected into the heating circuit
T°C Minimum flow injected into the heating circuit
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:FA[0].pe_abschalttemp: If this T°C is reached, the burner stops so that the T ° C goes down
lang.tooltip.CAPPL:FA[0].pe_einschalthys: Restarts the burner if (T°C Cutoff - Hysteresis on) is reached
